items.summary: Add 30 new high-quality AI prompt records distributed across the existing backend prompt categories (#videoGeneration, #photoGeneration, #cgiAds, #marketing, #storytelling, #business, #socialMedia, #design) so they are persisted in canister state and returned by the existing prompt listing APIs (getAllPrompts, getPromptsByCategory). Each new prompt must include: title, description, fullText, tags, and correct values for isPopular/isNew/isPremium.

Ensure the newly added prompts are visible in the existing Prompt Library UI by relying on the current fetch flow (useGetAllPrompts â†’ PromptLibraryPage) without requiring manual admin creation steps.
